Hero.description: Building high-performance web applications with modern technologies.

TechStack.title: Tech Stack
TechStack.description: A curated list of technologies I use to build scalable, high-performance applications.

Projects.1_title: Holy Quran App ‚Äì Sheikh Mahmoud Khalil Al-Husary (Warsh)
Projects.1_desc: A Progressive Web App (PWA) for listening to the Holy Quran in the Warsh reading by Sheikh Mahmoud Khalil Al-Husary, designed for high performance and offline use.
Projects.1_challenge: The app needed to work seamlessly offline, caching 480 audio files (60 Hizbs √ó 8 Athman) while providing a smooth, premium Islamic-themed user experience.
Projects.1_solution: Built with Next.js 16 and Serwist for service worker management. Audio files are cached automatically on first playback. Users can also bulk-download entire Hizbs or the full Quran for offline listening.
Projects.1_impact: Delivers a fully offline Quran listening experience with an elegant dark Islamic UI, automatic next-track playback, and precise navigation by Hizb and Thumn.
Projects.2_desc: A multilingual, offline-first PWA for center management built with Next.js, Prisma, and MongoDB.
Projects.2_challenge: Building a robust offline-first system that syncs local IndexedDB data with a remote MongoDB database, while supporting three languages (Arabic, English, French) and complex CRUD operations.
Projects.2_solution: Used Dexie.js for offline IndexedDB storage with a custom sync engine. Prisma handles server-side data operations, and next-intl provides seamless multilingual support. Serwist powers the PWA service worker.
Projects.2_impact: Enables full center management even without internet. Data syncs automatically when connectivity resumes, supporting students, payments, timetables, and more.
Projects.arch_desc: A professional, responsive landing page for an architecture firm, built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.
Projects.arch_challenge: Designing a high-impact, visual-first landing page with social integration and RTL support.
Projects.arch_solution: Built with React and Tailwind CSS for speed and flexibility, featuring a Projects Gallery and Services overview.
Projects.arch_impact: Completed a fully responsive, RTL-optimized site ready for deployment to GitHub Pages.
Projects.re_desc: A modern Real Estate Management system with property & investment management, agent dashboards, analytics, and multilingual PWA support.
Projects.re_challenge: Building a comprehensive platform with property listings, investment tracking, agent dashboards, and multilingual support while ensuring a premium responsive experience.
Projects.re_solution: Built with Next.js 14, Prisma with PostgreSQL, Clerk authentication, and Tailwind CSS. Features include media uploads via UploadThing, visit analytics, and full i18n support.
Projects.re_impact: Delivers a complete real estate management solution with agent analytics, investment tracking, and a seamless multilingual client experience.
Projects.todo_desc: A modern, RTL-designed desktop task manager with timed notifications, image attachments, and local persistence using Electron.
Projects.todo_challenge: Managing multi-window synchronization and ensuring a smooth RTL experience in a desktop environment with local database persistence.
Projects.todo_solution: Built with Electron and JsStore. Implemented IPC communication for multi-window management and integrated native system notifications.
Projects.todo_impact: Provides a privacy-focused, offline-first task management experience tailored for Arabic users.
Projects.mydoctor_title: My Doctor (ÿ∑ÿ®Ÿäÿ®Ÿä) ‚Äì Full Stack Healthcare Platform
Projects.mydoctor_desc: A comprehensive mobile and web platform connecting patients with doctors, featuring search, map integration, and secure profile management.
Projects.graphql_desc: A full-stack event management application with real-time updates via GraphQL subscriptions, JWT authentication, and a responsive RTL Arabic interface.
Projects.recipe_title: My Recipe üç≥ ‚Äì Full Stack Sharing Platform
Projects.recipe_desc: A recipe sharing platform built with Ionic React and Express, featuring a rich-text editor, comments, location tracking, and offline PWA support.
Projects.voicenotes_desc: A powerful Progressive Web App for recording and managing voice notes with offline-first storage using Dexie.js and cloud synchronization with MongoDB.
Projects.photoshare_title: Photo Share üì∏ ‚Äì Modern Social Media Platform
Projects.photoshare_desc: A full-stack photo sharing application featuring a responsive React 19 frontend and a robust Express API with MongoDB, JWT authentication, and secure image uploads via Multer.
Projects.whatsapp_desc: A production-grade, full-stack real-time messaging application built with React Native and Node.js, featuring WebSockets, read receipts, and online presence tracking.
